    • Constructor Detail

      • PastryItem

        public PastryItem​(java.lang.String name,
                  double cost,
                  java.lang.String flavor,
                  boolean heat)
        constructor with parameters from superclass constructor
        Parameters:
        name - represents Item type (Muffin, Cookie,etc;)
        cost - represents pastry's price
        flavor - represents pastry flavor (depends on if Muffin is chosen, or Cookie is chosen, etc;)
        heat - boolean representing if user wants pastry heated (true = heated, false = not heated)

        calculateCost in class Item
        Returns:
        double cost of the item

      • heatingOption

        public java.lang.String heatingOption​(boolean heat)
        getter for heatingOption, displayed on receipt and added to pastry toString
        Parameters:
        heat - represents boolean true or false
        Returns:
        String "heated" if true, or "not heated" if false

        setter for heating option
        Parameters:
        isHeated - represents true or false option chosen by user
